Ratio: 1:1 Military flag[edit] Flag Date Use Description 1992—present Flag of the Armed Forces State coat of arms in the center. In the flag edges are two-branch wreaths. 1990—present Naval jack National flag in square format with two white anchors in saltire at the center of the blue stripe. 1913—present Air force flag Flag of the Air Forces in square format, white with roundel in its center.
